OOC: Why does he need energon, or need to be in stasis lock right 
now?  You can be hit by the Vok Destroyer and still not notice it for 
several weeks.  There isn't even an initial shock.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Destructor ran as fast as he could with proto on his back. He was 
going fast 
> just from the plasma wounds. He was never going to catch this in 
time. But he 
> got an idea. he transformed and grabbed proto. Heemptied his plasma 
gun and 
> poured Proto into it. he fired it and it flew into the shot. Proto 
glowed and 
> formed a square metal object. His form of stasis lock. Destructor 
picked him 
> up sending a comm to Megatron. "I wish to request some energon to 
save this 
> bots life. he after all saved yours!"
